void NeuralNetwork.Networks.INetwork.Connect (  ) 

Connects the network.

A network is said to be connected if:

1. its layers are connected and 2. its connectors are connected.

Implemented in NeuralNetwork.Networks.Network, and NeuralNetwork.Networks.NetworkDecorator.

void NeuralNetwork.Networks.INetwork.Disconnect (  ) 

Disconnects the network.

A network is said to be disconnected if:

1. its layers are disconnected and 2. its connectors are disconnected.

Implemented in NeuralNetwork.Networks.Network, and NeuralNetwork.Networks.NetworkDecorator.
